#include<bits/stdc++.h>
int main()
{
    long long  tc,n,m,a,b,i;
    scanf("%lld",&tc);
    while(tc--)
    {
        a=1,b=1;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&m);
        for(i=1;i<=n-1;i++)
        {
            a=a+b;
            if(a>m)
                a=a-m;
            b=a+b;
            if(b>m)
                b=b-m;
        }
        printf("%lld/%lld\n",a,b);
    }
    return 0;
}
